app.backupDomainsDescription: Backup domain list for domain resolution, one domain per line
app.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
app.deleteWarning: Data cannot be recovered after deletion. Please proceed with caution.
app.describeDescription: Used to describe the application, displayed in the app list
app.encryptionDescription: Choose the encryption method for client communication. If selected, the client will use this method to communicate with the server
app.nameDescription: Application name, displayed in the app list
app.selectAppDescription: Select the app to configure, all settings will apply to the selected app
app.startupPictureDescription: Startup picture, supports network and local images. For network images, please enter the complete image URL
app.startupPictureSkipDescription: Startup picture display time in seconds, enter 0 to not display

config.singleSubscriptionModeDescription: When enabled, all user subscriptions will be converted to balance
config.subscriptionDomainDescription: Used for subscription; leave blank to use site domain
config.subscriptionDomainPlaceholder: Enter subscription domain, one per line
config.subscriptionPathDescription: Used for subscription; be sure to restart the system after modification for optimal performance

confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
deleteWarning: Data cannot be recovered after deletion. Please proceed with caution.

form.deductionRatioDescription: Used for deduction. By default, the system adopts an automatic calculation algorithm. When a manual ratio is provided, the system calculates proportions based on the time and traffic ratio, ensuring the total equals 100%.
form.discountDescription: Set discount based on unit price
form.name: Name
form.purchaseWithDiscountDescription: Enable or disable unsubscribe functionality. After activation, the system will perform deduction processing according to the configured rules and proportions, and the remaining value will be returned to the balance
form.selectUnitTime: Please select a unit of time
